column2: "The bottom of the ocean? I suppose it's time to cry for help."
"There's nothing to fear, for it is I, Patty here!"
"Hello, Tea here. Ignore my sister. Seriously, just ignore her."
"Hey, don't ignore her! It only makes me want to be that much more annoying!"
"So, you realize what a pest you are, and still continue to do it? Can you explain where we are, then?"
"Leave it to me! This is underground under the ocean! But there's no water!"
"It should be the sea floor, but the water is being held back somehow. As you can see, it's one large cavern down here."
"There are also unusual facilities which have been discovered and are being investigated."
"That being said, none of the information is being made public!"
"There are natives we can communicate with and yet, there's no official notice. What could possibly be reason for that?"
"Either they've decided not to post anything, or simply that they're not going to post anything. Can't tell, though."
"It also seems that the facilities are being destroyed. But by who and why is still unkown."
"Because of everything going on, already violent enemies have become even more violent!"
"If you're going to investigate down here, be careful not to get caught up in anything!"
